Pollutants emitted from tour buses include carbon dioxide (CO2), nitrogen oxides (NOx), particulate matter (PM), and hydrocarbons (HC). These pollutants contribute to air pollution, which can lead to adverse health effects.
The main pollutants emitted by vehicles are carbon dioxide (CO2), nitrogen oxides (NOx), particulate matter (PM), hydrocarbons (HC), and carbon monoxide (CO).
